title: Introduction to `xe`
goal: Learn `xe`, which swaps x1 and x5, completing the conversion system.

sections.content:
Warm-up (2-3 min)

Conversion family review:

se: x1 ↔ x2
te: x1 ↔ x3
ve: x1 ↔ x4
xe: x1 ↔ x5 (today!)

Quick drill — what does each conversion foreground for vecnu?

  • se vecnu → ? (goods)
  • te vecnu → ? (buyer)
  • ve vecnu → ? (price)

New Material (5-7 min)

The Fifth Place: xe

la karce xe klama la .paris. la .london. la dargu mi — The car is the vehicle for going to Paris from London via the road by me.

xe swaps x1 and x5. This is rare because few gismu have meaningful fifth places.

xe with klama

Original klama:

klama — x1 (goer) goes to x2 (dest) from x3 (origin) via x4 (route) using x5 (vehicle)

With xe:

xe klama — x1 (vehicle) carries to x2 from x3 via x4 by x5 (goer)
Normal With xe
mi klama la .paris. la .london. la dargu la karce la karce xe klama la .paris. la .london. la dargu mi
I go to Paris from London via the road by car. The car is the vehicle for going to Paris from London via the road by me.

When to Use xe

xe is rare. Use it when:

  1. Discussing the vehicle itself: "What vehicle did you use?"
  2. The fifth place is the natural topic

Most conversations don't need xe — but knowing it completes your understanding.

The Complete Conversion System

Cmavo Swaps Foregrounds
se x1 ↔ x2 second place
te x1 ↔ x3 third place
ve x1 ↔ x4 fourth place
xe x1 ↔ x5 fifth place

All Conversions with klama

Version x1 becomes
klama goer
se klama destination
te klama origin
ve klama route
xe klama vehicle

Key Point

xe swaps x1↔x5, completing the conversion system. It's rare but exists for completeness.

sections.content:
Practice (4-5 min)

Exercise 1: Apply xe

Rewrite using xe:

  1. mi klama la zarci la zdani zo'e la karce → ?
  2. la .bob. cu klama la .paris. la .london. la dargu la .treni. → ?
Answers
  1. la karce xe klama la zarci la zdani zo'e mi
  2. la .treni. xe klama la .paris. la .london. la dargu la .bob.

Exercise 2: Match Conversion to Focus

Which conversion makes the underlined element the topic?

  1. mi klama la .paris. la .london. la dargu __la karce__ → ?
  2. mi klama __la .paris.__ la .london. la dargu la karce → ?
  3. mi klama la .paris. la .london. __la dargu__ la karce → ?
  4. mi klama la .paris. __la .london.__ la dargu la karce → ?
Answers
  1. xe — vehicle
  2. se — destination
  3. ve — route
  4. te — origin

Exercise 3: Complete Conversion Practice

Take mi vecnu la cukta la .bob. mu no and write all four conversions:

  1. se vecnu → ?
  2. te vecnu → ?
  3. ve vecnu → ?
Answers
  1. la cukta se vecnu mi la .bob. mu no (book as topic)
  2. la .bob. te vecnu la cukta mi mu no (buyer as topic)
  3. mu no ve vecnu la cukta la .bob. mi (price as topic)

sections.content:
Conversation Challenge (1-2 min)

Say aloud:

  1. "I go to Paris by car." → mi klama la .paris. zo'e zo'e la karce
  2. "The car is the vehicle for going to Paris." → la karce xe klama la .paris.
  3. "The train is the vehicle for going to London." → la .treni. xe klama la .london.

Today's Vocab

No new gismu — focus on completing the conversion system.

Complete conversion reference:

Cmavo Swaps Example with klama
se x1↔x2 destination becomes topic
te x1↔x3 origin becomes topic
ve x1↔x4 route becomes topic
xe x1↔x5 vehicle becomes topic

Summary

You learned xe, the final conversion operator, which swaps x1 and x5. While rare, it completes the system: se/te/ve/xe let you foreground any place from 2 to 5.
